sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: before; in the past year(s)
of Qi; belonging to Qi; coming from Qi
the common people of Npl
desire (objects) 甚欲; hanker after
gold =黃金
As for the topic, there is N[SUBJ](A) 有 B: There is/exists a certain B (at/among A) 宋人有拔苗者
early morning; early in the morning
read pī: wear (cloth); bear (shield etc); abstractly, occasionally: bear (a bad name etc)
(primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)
official hat used to indicate one's social position
go to (so as to stay there for a considerable time, or for some business); move towards; of things: be moved to
market; also more generally: the marketplace (with gates??); market settlements
go to and get to a certain place; be on one's way to a certain place, head for
try to sell, offer for sale; trade in
golden [objects]
the place as specified by N
ZZ 995: (of monkey) pick up things or hang onto things with one's feet; LAO 55: prone to pick up prey with one's legs (as birds); HANSHU: pick up and capture with one's feet (as a bird)
try to escape; try to leave the scene
minor law enforcement officer; police officer; magistrate
arrest somebody
to ask (followed by direct speech)
people; the people 君者舟也；人者水也。"The ruler is (like) a boat; the (his) people are (like) water"
everyone; anyone; all of them (quantifies then) (The manifest verbal derivation is from "be together", hence this is not construed as an nadV.)
literally: be in the place N
there
polite: you
other people's
why is it the case that S?; why is it so?, what is the reason of it?......,何也?
answer politely
pick up, take up; go and get (what one owns), fetch
in the time of S1
perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)
only; just; merely (negated as 非徒 rarely 不徒)

tls:text.tls:line: manners and laws to support them;

sense.def: ritual-based legal system

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu's younger brother Bu

sense.def: Standard Name: Mèng Sūn Yáng 孟孫陽 Also known as: Yáng Zhū 楊朱 Unger no. 496

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu's younger brother Bu

sense.def: brother of N

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu's younger brother Bu

sense.def: be called

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: wear as one's clothes, use for clothing; dress up in (someone's clothes)

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: pale white; pristine off-white, unadorned plain white; clad in unadorned plain white

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: (primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: depart, leave the place where one happens to be (to leave the room, leave the house; leave the capital); come out; set out on an expedition

tls:text.tls:line: It rained,

sense.def: cause it to rain

tls:text.tls:line: It rained,

sense.def: Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: and he took off the white coat

sense.def: take off (clothes); cease to wear

tls:text.tls:line: and came back wearing a black one.

sense.def: black

tls:text.tls:line: and came back wearing a black one.

sense.def: return home

tls:text.tls:line: His dog did not recognise him,

sense.def: his own

tls:text.tls:line: His dog did not recognise him,

sense.def: originally: puppy, also the young of bears and tigers; mostely generally: dog

tls:text.tls:line: His dog did not recognise him,

sense.def: recognise the identity of the contextually determinate person

tls:text.tls:line: and barked when it came out to welcome him.

sense.def: go out to meet (in a hostile or friendly way); specifically: to welcome, come out to welcome (also seasons like spring)

tls:text.tls:line: and barked when it came out to welcome him.

sense.def: bark at

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Bu, angry, was about to beat the dog.

sense.def: become angry

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Bu, angry, was about to beat the dog.

sense.def: will V; is willing to V; have the intention to

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: you (my daughter etc)

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: don't verb any object 無言; don't Vt at any time "don't speak!"; so as not to

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: strike the contextually determinate object

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: marker of (probably mild) imperative sentences

tls:text.tls:line: You are no different yourself.

sense.def: likewise, also (sometimes with omitted antecedent, as in 盜亦有道乎？)

tls:text.tls:line: You are no different yourself.

sense.def: copula-like verb: be like; be no better than

tls:text.tls:line: You are no different yourself.

sense.def: this (particular concrete thing)

seg.line: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: a little time ago

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: supposing as a purely hypothetical and theoretical, or at least remote, possibility

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: your

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: be white; of swords: blank, i.e. drawn; derived nominal usage; of hair: be grey

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: and at the same time, and on that occasion

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: go one's way; go away, leave; get out; go out; set out for campaigns

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: be black

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: come to a contextually determinate place (i.e. the place where the speaker currently is)

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: introducing rhetorical questions

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: be (temporarily) able to

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: be surprised because of the contextually determinate situation

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: (in questions) rhetorical (marked explicitly as rhetorical by such particles as 豈)

tls:text.tls:line: and when the retainers could think of no more tricks

sense.def: definite: the retainers

tls:text.tls:line: It is not only the sage, only the highest man,

sense.def: (presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: there were Primal Beginnings

sense.def: the great beginning

tls:text.tls:line: The Primal Beginnings

sense.def: the great beginning
